Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj

loans.use: To purchase more cows

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 
Гулбахор  Ортикова  вдова, у нее нет детей. Занимается она животноводством. Проживает Гулбахор в Ганчинском районе.
Дома у нее есть 24 голов домашнего скота. Можно сказать, что целая ферма. Для откорма домашнего скота ей необходима сумма, в размере 1200 сомони. С этой целью она обратилась к нам. 
 Так же, Гулбахор перерабатывает молоко в домашних условиях и продает его женщине соседке, которая торгует  молоком на рынке.
texts.en:
Gulbahor O. is a widow and has no children. She lives in the Gonjy district and is involved in animal husbandry. Gulbahor owns 24 head of livestock at home – almost a farm. She needs a sum of 1200 somoni in order to feed her livestock. This is why she reached out to us. Gulbahor also processes milk at home and sells it to a neighbor, who sells milk at a market.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Livestock feeding

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth P. is from the village of Bobontugan, Jasaan, Misamis Oriental. She is single, 23 years old, and she has one school-aged child.

To make a living Ruth owns and operates an "a la carte" -- a small stall where she sells grilled chicken and pork. Ruth is just starting this business.

In 2009, Ruth joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Ruth successfully repaid a previous loan of 4,000 PHP from HSPFI that she used to purchase chicken and pork meat to grill and sell.

Ruth is requesting a new loan of 6000 PHP which she will use to invest in her business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to support her child's education.

About HSPFI
HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To invest in her a la carte business

loans.name: Khujayor

texts.en:
K. Khujayor is 50 years old. He is married and has 5 children. 

Khujayor sells cattle. As a rule he purchases small cattle in the central market, feeds them and then resells them at higher prices in the local market. 

Having been in this business for 5 years he knows very well how to choose the animals, how to breed them and look after them. He gets up every morning in order to feed the animals and to look after them. His knowledge and skills allow him to make his business successful and to generate a considerable, stable income for his large family. 

Khujayor is planning to enlarge the stock and to purchase more cattle. For this purpose he requests $700 that will purchase two young cattle. You can become an important part in Khujayor family's life and he deeply appreciates the trust and support you are giving him.    

More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj

loans.use: To purchase two cattle to raise and sell.

loans.name: Okerike

texts.en:
Okerike M. is 32 years old and is married. He sells provisions.

Okerike hopes for a loan of N80,000 to purchase more provisions to sell. 

He says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions to sell.

loans.name: Fayemi

texts.en:
Fayemi D. is 41 years old, and she is married with two children. She sells second-hand shoes of various colors to her customers. 

She is requesting a loan amount of N140,000 to purchase more second-hand shoes to sell. 

Fayemi D. says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more second-hand shoes to sell.

loans.name: Kossi Agbessi

texts.fr:
Ce monsieur exerce dans la menuiserie depuis 2007, il a ouvert son propre atelier. En dehors des commandes qu’il reçoit, il fabrique lui-même des meubles et des lits  qu’il expose devant son atelier pour attirer le regard des passants, actuellement son stock de matières nécessaires à son activité est épuisé. Il veut en acheter et demande pour cela un crédit à WAGES pour acheter 10 planches Teck, 05 planches Iroco, 05 planches acajou, 01 contre plaqué, 2 boîtes de vernis, 2 boîtes de diluant, 02 boîtes de colles.
Il est marié et père d’un enfant, c’est avec le revenu de son activité qu’il subvient aux charges de sa famille.
texts.en:
This is a gentleman who has been working in carpentry since 2007. He has opened his own workshop. Besides the orders he receives, he himself makes furniture and beds that he displays in front of his shop to attract customers. Currently, his stock of supplies necessary for his business is exhausted. He wants to buy some, and for this reason, he's asking WAGES for a loan to buy: 10 teak boards, 5 iroko wood boards, 5 cashew wood boards, 1 sheet of plywood, 2 cans of varnish, 2 cans of thinner, and 2 cans of glue. He is married and the father of one child. With the revenues from his business, he provides for his family.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy the necessary supplies for the woodworking business

loans.name: Suyunboy

texts.en:
Married and father of two children, Suyunboy K. was born on August 28, 1974. 

Coming from an area where cattle-raising is popular, Suyunboy has been selling cattle since 2003. He buys them in his village from the farmers who raise them and then sells them at the markets. As his business capital is limited, he buys just a few and then after he sells those, he returns to buy more. 

Today Suyunboy would like to expand his business by increasing his capital, so that he can maximize his profits. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to purchase young cattle. This will be his first loan with IMON International, and his evaluation shows he is qualified to receive the loan.

To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj

loans.use: To purchase young cattle and expand his business.

loans.name: Dilbaroy

texts.ru: Дилбарой – 40 лет. Замужем и мать 2-х детей. Она занимается продажей яиц и конфет. Она торгует на рынке "Афганбазар" находящийся в районе «Панчшанбе» города Худжанда. Дилбарой закупает конфеты от фирм поставщиков а яйца и оптовиков ранним утром. Её муж плотник. Дилбарой кредитуется у нас с 2007 года. Когда она начинала, у нее было небольшое место торговли. Но сейчас Дилбарой расширилась, и за свой последний кредит, она закупила партию новых импортных конфет. Теперь у Дилбарой увеличился ассортимент. Новый займ она просит для закупки разных конфет от Российской фирмы "Сладко".
texts.en:
Dilbaroy is 40 years old, married and has 2 children. She sells eggs and candy at the Afganbazar market in the Panchshanbe district of Khujand. Dilbaroy buys candy from supplier firms and eggs from wholesalers early every morning. Her husband is a carpenter. Dilbaroy has been our client since 2007. When she first started her business, her retail stand was very small. Since then, Dilbaroy expanded and used her last loan to buy a stock of new imported candies. Her merchandise assortment increased. Dilbaroy is requesting this new loan in order to purchase different candies from the Russian firm Sladko.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of candy from the Sladko firm

loans.name: Uyigun

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Уйгун Мирзоев занимается животноводством, проживает в Ганчинском районе. Женат на Сайере, отец 4 детей. Жена Сайера помогает ему в откорме скота, так как Уйгун подрабатывает мастером по ремонту жилых домов, и ему приходится отлучаться по этой работе.
Займ хочет получить для закупа дойной коровы, чтобы добывать и перерабатывать молоко.
texts.en:
Uyigun M. lives in the Gonjy district and is involved in animal husbandry. He is married and has 4 children. His wife, Sayora, helps him with feeding livestock because Uyigun also does home repairs part-time and has to attend to this job at times. He wants to obtain this loan to buy a dairy cow in order to get and process milk.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a dairy cow

loans.name: Blessing

texts.en:
Blessing E. sells secondhand underwear and has been in this business for a long time. She is married with eight children and she is 55 years old.

She is requesting the loan of N80,000 to purchase more secondhand underwear to sell. Blessing says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more secondhand underwear to sell

loans.name: Hazrat

texts.en: K. Hazrat is a 44-year-old married man who owns a small farm. He is a hard-working man who has fought to provide for his family and educate his children, who today are working adults thanks to his example. Hazrat has a business raising and selling cattle and has five years of experience in this field. Since cattle-raising and selling is a profitable business, Hazrat has become a very successful businessman. He works very hard and spends all his time with his animals, cleaning them and feeding and pasturing them. Now Hazrat wants to expand his business and buy more cattle, so he applied for a loan of 2,500 Somoni. Hazrat thanks all lenders for their support. More about Tajikistan and IMON International Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium B.C. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions. But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty. IMON's History Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj

loans.use: To expand his business and buy more cattle

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys O. sells kitchen utensils like cooking pots, plates, spoons, etc. She is married with four children and is 44 years old.

Gladys is requesting the loan of N100,000 to purchase more kitchen utensils to sell. Gladys says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more kitchen utensils to sell

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon A. sells wivons, cream and other hair products at Ekuase. Sharon has received primary education. She is married and has one child. She is responsible for paying school fees and housekeeping expenses. Her husband is a trader.

Sharon has been selling wivons and cream since 2006. Her loan will be used to buy more wivons and cream for resale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to reinvest in her business to increase her capital and profits.

loans.use: To buy more wivons and cream for resale

loans.name: Hikmatoy

texts.ru: Хикматой – 38 лет. Замужем и мать 3-х детей. Она занимается продажей женского нижнего белья. Она торгует на втором этаже рынка «Панчшанбе» города Худжанда. Хикматой закупает товар из оптового рынка города Истаравшан и часть товара из города Бишкек Республики Киргизстан. Она ездит за товаром 3-4 раза в месяц. Её муж нигде не работает. Он приехал из Росийской Федерации, потому что из за финансового кризиса работодатели ему не оплатили за работу.  Хикматой впервые кредитуется у нас. Хикматой просит кредит для закупки новой партии летнего женского белья их хлопчатобумажной ткани. Тогда у Хикматой увеличится ассортимент ее товара.
texts.en:
Hikmatoy is 38 years old, married and has 3 children. She sells women’s lingerie on the second floor of the Panchshanbe market in Khujand. Hikmatoy buys her merchandise at a wholesale market in the city of Istaravshan and in the city of Bishkek in the Kyrgyzstan Republic. She travels there for her merchandise 3-4 times per month. Her husband is not employed. He returned from the Russian Federation because his employers there did not pay for his work due to the financial crisis. This is Hikmatoy’s first time requesting a loan from us. She wants to obtain this loan in order to purchase a new stock of women’s summer cotton lingerie and increase her merchandise assortment.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of women’s summer cotton lingerie

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth K. is married and has four children. She has received schooling through primary education. Her husband is a fisherman.

Elizabeth sells fried fish and kenkey at Akuase (kenkey is prepared from milled maize grains, cooked and taken with hot pepper and fried fish). She has been in this business since 2006 and uses her income to pay school fees and other domestic expenses.

Elizabeth will use the loan to buy more fish and maize. With the new profits from her expanded business, She plans to reinvest to generate more income and profits.

loans.use: To buy more fish and maize for the production of kenkey on a larger scale

loans.name: Malohat

texts.ru: Малохат – женщина 43 года. Замужем и мать 3-х детей. Занимается продажей декоративной косметики на втором этаже рынка «Панчшанбе» города Худжанда. У Малохат очень большой ассортимент косметики и соответственно у нее много клиентов. Малохат закупает товар у фирм-поставщиков и индивидуальных дистрибьюторов. Сейчас современная молодёжь предпочитает дорогую косметику известных компаний. Поэтому Малохат просит займ для закупки партию декоративной косметики от Джордани Голд компании Орифлейм.
texts.en:
Malohat is 43 years old, married and has 3 children. She sells decorative cosmetics on the second floor of the Panchshanbe market in Khujand. Malohat has a wide assortment of cosmetics and, thus, has many customers. She buys her merchandise from supplier firms and individual distributors. Nowadays, young people prefer expensive cosmetics from well-known companies. This is why Malohat is requesting a loan to buy a stock of Djordani Gold decorative cosmetics from Oriflame.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of decorative cosmetics from Oriflame

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Martha O. sells smoked and fresh fish. She is happy with this business because she makes a lot of sales from it. She is married with six children and she is 46 years old. She is requesting a loan of N50,000 to purchase more fish to sell. Martha O. says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Zuhro

texts.ru: Зухро – женщина 43 лет. Замужем и мать 3-х детей. Занимается продажей канцтоваров и декоративных открыток на втором этаже рынка «Панчшанбе» города Худжанда. Её муж разнорабочий. Когда свободен помогает жене в торговле. У Зухро 2 сына и одна дочь. Зухро закупает товар у фирм – поставщиков. Они привозят товар прямо в её магазин. Поэтому Зухро не так уж трудно приходится в бизнесе. Зухро планирует на новый займ закупить партию декоративных искусственных цветов.
texts.en:
Zuhro is 43 years old, married and has 3 children. She sells office supplies and greeting cards on the second floor of the Panchshanbe market in Khujand. Her husband is a handyman and helps Zuhro with the business in his free time. Zuhro has 2 sons and one daughter. Zuhro buys her merchandise from supplier firms. They deliver the goods right to her store, which makes business easier for Zuhro. She plans to use her new loan to buy a stock of decorative artificial flowers.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of decorative artificial flowers

loans.name: Timi

texts.en:
Timi owns a restaurant and bar where she sells cooked foods and drinks. She is married with a child and she is 37 years old.

Timi is requesting the loan of N140,000 to purchase more foodstuffs and drinks. Timi says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuffs and drinks

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose E. sells provisions and rice. She is 32 years old and is married with three children. She is requesting the loan of N100,000 to purchase more provisions and rice to sell. Rose says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions and rice to sell

loans.name: Aida

texts.fr: AIDA F. est une femme mariée et mère de trois enfants;elle vit avec son mari au camp tropical de thiès ;elle a commencé à faire du commerce depuis plus de dix ans et gère une boutique chez elle;elle a bénéficié de trois crédits qu'elle a remboursé sans difficulté ;avec la somme qu'elle demande ,elle veut réparer son véhicule qui est en panne
texts.en:
AIDA F. is a married woman and the mother of three. She lives with her husband in Camp Tropical in Thiès. She started doing commerce over ten years ago and manages a shop in her home. She has benefited from three loans that she has repaid without difficulty. With the funds she's requesting, she wants to repair her vehicle, which is broken down.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Vehicle repair

loans.name: Helena Francisco

texts.pt:
Helena Francisco N. nasceu no distrito de matutuine, casada, e pai de 2 filhos (de 19 e 13 anos de idade) sendo o mais novo estudante numa das escolas oficiais de boane.
 Estudou ate 7 classe por causa de ter perdido os pais muito cedo. Vive em boane a mais de 20 anos com seu marido, matural de cidade de maputo.

Aprendeu a fazer negocio há 5 anos sem empregado, tendo aprendido a fazer o negocio com o seu irmão mais velho que também exerce esta actividade com bastante experiência.
O seu forte é de venda de refrigerantes e obtém um rendimento mensal de 3.00,00MT. Vive na casa própria e este é o seu segundo empréstimo com a hluvuku e o primeiro com o KIVA para compra de produtos diversos.
Esta não é a sua primeira relação com instituições de credito, foi cliente de um dos pequenos bancos que operam no distrito. Na hluvuku, gosta de bom atendimento e de prestações mensais a sua medida. O primeiro empréstimo de foi de 13.000,00MT que aplicou no reforço do negocio. Com o credito de 15.000,00MT, o negocio vai melhorar porque poderá satisfazer a demanda e manter, positivamente, a estabilidade do negocio e com clientes cada vez mais satisfeitos.
O seu sonho é de fazer um estabelecimento, feito de material convencional, para desenvolver a actividade em ambiente digno. Diz que o pressuposto para atingir os objectivos futuros, é de pagar bem os empréstimos.
texts.en:
Helena Francisco N. was born in Matatuine district. She is married and the mother of two children (19 and 13 years old), one who is the youngest student at one of the official schools in Boane. Helena studied through seventh grade because she lost her parents very early. A native of the city Maputo, she has lived in Boane for more than 20 years with her husband. They live in their own home.

She learned how to run a business during five years of unemployment, having to learn this with her older sibling who also learned by experience. Her specialty is selling sodas, and she makes a monthly income of 300 MT (meticais). This is Elena's second loan with Hluvuku (Kiva's Field Partner) and her first with Kiva. She will use it to buy a variety of products. This is not her first experience with a lending institution; she was a client of two small banks that work in the district. At Hluvuku, she likes the good service and using monthly installments. Her first loan was for 13,000 MT (meticais), which she used to strengthen her business. With the loan of 15,000 MT, the business will improve because she will be able to meet the demand and positively maintain the stability of her business with clients who are more and more satisfied.

Helena's dream is to build an establishment with conventional materials to develop her business in a dignified setting. She says that requisite for reaching her future objectives is paying her loans properly.

Translated from Portuguese by April Newman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase stock in her shop

loans.name: Kurbonboi

texts.ru: Курбонбой – молодой мужчина 1978 года рождения. Женат и отец 2-х детей. Занимается продажей солнечных очков на втором этаже рынка «Панчшанбе» города Худжанда, магазин № 222. Его жена домохозяйка, нянчит своих маленьких детей. Курбонбой привозит товар из города Бишкека Республики Киргизии. Он ездит за товаром 1 раз в месяц. Курбонбой планирует расширить бизнес и закупить партию декоративных искусственных цветов и некоторых видов хозтоваров. Поэтому он просит кредит для осуществления его планов.
texts.en:
Kurbonboi is a young man, who was born in 1978. He's married and the father of two children. He earns his living selling sunglasses from Store No. 222 on the second floor of the Panchshanbe market in Khujand. His wife is a housewife and looks after their young children. He goes once a month to Bishkek in the Kyrgyz Republic to get his merchandise. Kurbonboi plans to expand his business by buying a stock of artificial flowers and a variety of housewares, so he is requesting a loan to achieve his goals.

Translated from Russian by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy housewares and artificial flowers

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes A. is a widow and has two children. She has received schooling through the primary level. Agnes sells clothing at Shama junction. She has done this since 2008. Her husband passed away.  Agnes uses her income to pay school fees for the children and other domestic expenses. Agnes will use the loan to buy more bales of clothes for resale to expand her business. With her new profits from her expanded business, Agnes plans to reinvest to increase her capital and profits.

loans.use: Agnes will use the loan to buy more bales of clothes for resale to expand her business

loans.name: Maria Emília

texts.pt:
Maria Emilia C. nasceu em Gaza no distrito de Guija (onde produz se muito caju), casada e mãe de 3 filhos de idades compreendidas entre 19 e 29 anos encontrando se todos a estudarem.
Maria tem formação media pelo Instituto comercial de Maputo. Saiu de Guija com os seus pais quando tinha apenas dois anos de idade e cresceu na cidade de Maputo, com a sua família.
Vive em boane e em casa própria, sem ninguém mais pessoas sob sua responsabilidade. É coordenadora adjunta numa Organização social que opera no distrito, onde ganha um salário mensal no valor de 8.000,00MT por mês.

Desenvolve actividade de venda de panelas há mais de quarto anos, aprendeu com sua cunhada que também faz à mesma actividade. O custo de cada item varia de 120,00MT a 500,00MT e com boa rotação.
Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo com a hluvuku e já se beneficiou de outros créditos com outras instituições. Aderiu ao hluvuku através de informações que os amigos deram de encorajamento para tal.

O seu primeiro crédito com a hluvuku foi de 6.000,00MT e 12.000,00MT, respectivamente, que os aplicou neste negocio. Concluiu pagamentos em harmonia com o combinado do contrato de empréstimo.
Diz que o seu negocio vai melhorar com este valor de 15.000,00MT que se destina ao reforço do negocio.
Tem como objectivo expandir o negocio e comprar um molde para fazer panelas, pessoalmente e contratar trabalhadores para lhe ajudarem no trabalho.
texts.en:
Maria Emilia C. was born in Gaza Province, in the Guija district (where there a lot of cashews are produced). She left at the age of two with her parents, and was raised in Maputo. Maria is a married mother of three. Her children are between the ages of 19 and 29 and are currently studying. She lives in Boane (Mozambique), in her own home and is not responsible for any additional people. Maria has studied at the Commercial Institute of Maputo, and is the coordinator of a social organization located in her district, where her monthly salary is 8,000 MZM. Maria has sold pots and pans for more than four years, learning the business from her sister-in-law. The cost of each item varies between 120 and 500 MZM, and her inventory turnover is good. Maria received information about Hluvuku from friends, who encouraged her to apply for a loan. While Maria has benefited from loans through other institutions, this is her third loan with Hluvuku. The first loan from Hluvuku was for 6,000 MZM and the second was for 12,000 MZM; both were applied to her business. Each loan was repaid based on its terms. Maria will use this loan to buy a mold to make the pots and pans herself, hiring other workers to help her. She believes her business will grow by 15,000 MZM with this new investment.

Translated from Portuguese by Deborah Delzell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase a mold for pots and pans in order to increase her inventory

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.fr: MOHAMED S. est un enseignant de profession et loge au quartier cité senghor de thies avec sa femme et ses enfants;il a un batiment qu'il veut finir avant l'hivernage c'est pour cela qu'il sollicite ce pret
texts.en:
MOHAMED S. is a teacher by profession and is staying in the Cité Senghor district of Thies with his wife and children. He has a building he wants to finish before the off-season. This is why he's requesting a loan.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: CONSTRUCTION

loans.name: Bridget

texts.en: Bridget G. sells provisions and drinks on a wholesale and retail basis to her customers. She is married with five children and she is 49 years old. She is requesting a loan of N100,000 to purchase more provisions and drinks to sell. Bridget G. says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions and drinks

loans.name: Helen

texts.en: Helen L. sells sarongs of various colors and shapes. She is married with two children and she is 46 years old. She is requesting a loan of N100,000 to purchase more sarongs to sell. Helen says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more sarongs to sell

loans.name: Arlete Ana

texts.pt:
Arlete Ana C., natural de Namaacha, de 40 anos de idade, divorciada e mãe de 3 filhos de idades entre 18 e 25 anos dentre os quais dois são estudantes.
Estudou ate 11 classe e desistiu quando teve que ir ao lar.
Saiu de Namaacha a Maputo a fim de continuar com os estudos, depois que se separou do seu primeiro marido com o qual teve uma filha quando estava a fazer o segundo ano.
Do Instituto de Línguas de Maputo. Tempo depois, casou se com outro marido com o qual teve duas filhas. O segundo casamento durou cerca de 10 anos.
Neste momento vive na casa própria em boane a fazer negócios. Trabalha 10 horas por dia e sozinha. Tem 20 anos de experiência nesta actividade e o actual negocio mais forte é de venda de batata Reno e cebola, a grosso e retalho. Rende 7.000,00MT, mensalmente, que aplica na alimentação da família e manda algum dinheiro para sustentar a sua mãe.
Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo no valor dos 10.000,00MT com qual pretende dar continuidade a sua obra. Primeiramente levantou 10.000,00 e 15.000,00MT que foram para reforçar o negocio. Nunca teve empréstimo com outros bancos e soube da existência da hluvuku através de amigas.
Propõe se a reembolsar o empréstimo regularmente para poder aceder a mais créditos com o objectivo de terminar a sua obra, assim como ampliar o negocio.
texts.en:
Arlete Ana C., 40, is a native of Namaacha, Mozambique. She is the divorced mother of three children between the ages of 18 and 25 who are students. Arlete studied until the 11th grade, when she dropped out to stay at home. She left Namaacha for Maputo with the intention of continuing her studies, but she separated from her first husband when their child was younger than two. After some time, she married again and had two daughters. This second marriage lasted for about 10 years. Currently, Arlete lives in her own home in Boane and has her own wholesale and retail business selling potatoes and onions. With 20 years of experience, Arlete works 10 hours per day on her own. She makes 7,000 MZM monthly, which she uses to support her family, in addition to sending money to support her mother. Arlete learned about Hluvuku from friends, and she has not had loans through other banks. This is her third loan, a request for 10,000 MZM, which Arlete intends to use to continue construction on her home. The first and second loans raised 10,000 and 15,000 MZM, and were also used to build her business. Arlete plans to make regular payments so that she can borrow again in order to finish her home and continue to build her business.

Translated from Portuguese by Deborah Delzell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials

loans.name: Boury

texts.fr: boury N. est une femme mariée qui habite au quartier grand thiès avec sa famille,elle travaille dans une unité de transformation de céréales depuis trois ans et fait parallèlement du petit commerce de tissus;avec la somme qu'elle demande ,elle veut renforcer son stock de marchandises
texts.en:
Boury N. is a married woman who lives in the Grand Thiès district with her family. For three years, she has been working in a processing unit for grains. She also has a small business on the side for selling cloth. With the funds she's requesting, she wants to boost her stock of merchandise.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Commerce

loans.name: Beauty

texts.en: Beauty O. is 58 years old and married with eight children. She sells sarongs and the demand for them is high. Therefore she is requesting the loan amount of 100,000 NGN to purchase more sarongs to sell. Beauty sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more sarongs to sell

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en: Patricia N. is 40 years old and is married with five children. She sells drinks, coolers and toys, both wholesale and retail. Patricia is requesting the loan amount of 100,000 NGN to purchase more drinks to sell. She sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more drinks to sell

loans.name: Enoque Esrael

texts.pt:
Enoque Esrael M. nasceu em boane, solteiro de 21 anos de idade. Interrompeu os estudos na 11 classe por não conseguir reconciliar estudos e activade de sobrevivência.

Vende carne de vaca a retalho e a 160,00MT o kilo e não tem sido fácil adquirir cabeças para o abate, embora tenha experiência de mais de 5 anos.
O seu rendimento varia entre 2.000,00MT e 4.000,00MT e consegue poupar algum valor.
Vive em casa própria e este é o seu primeiro empréstimo com a Hluvuku e KIVA no valor de 11.000,00MT que solicitou graça a informação que obteve de um amigo.

Pretende comprar uma cabeça de gado bovino para reforçar o negocio e satisfazer a demanda de produto assim como melhor à dieta alimentar dos seus clientes.
Propõe se a reembolsar o valor sem problemas para no futuro, solicitar mais créditos para montar um talho próprio.
texts.en:
Enoque Esrael M. was born in Boane, Mozambique. He is single is 21 years old. His studies were interrupted in the 11th grade and he has not been able to continue his studies in order to make a living. Enoque sells beef retail at 160 MZM per kilo, and although he has 5 years of experience, he has not had an easy time buying cows to slaughter. His monthly income varies between 2,000 MZM and 4,000 MSM, and he has been able to save some money. Enoque lives in his own home and this is his first loan from Hluvuku and Kiva. He learned about Hluvuku and Kiva through information from a friend, and this is his first loan, a request for 11,000 MZM. Enoque plans to buy a head of cattle to build his business and meet demand, as well as to improve his customers’ diets. He plans to repay the loan so that he may borrow without problems in the future in order to establish his own butcher shop.

Translated from Portuguese by Deborah Delzell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase a head of cattle

loans.name: Daour

texts.fr: daour S. est une jeune femme née en 1978 à thiès ;elle est mariée et a deux enfants en charge;elle a commencé à faire du commerce depuis plus de dix ans avec le soutien de son père;elle sollicite ce pret pour renforcer son fonds de roulement pour la vente de parfums qu'elle achète à dakar
texts.en:
Daour S. is a young woman who was born in 1978 in Thiès. She is married and has two children in her care. She began doing commerce over ten years ago with the support of her father. She's requesting this loan to boost her working capital for selling perfumes that she buys in Dakar.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To sell perfumes

loans.name: José Safrão

texts.pt:
Jose safrao T. nasceu no distrito de vilanculos (a norte da província de inhambane), de 37anos de idade, casado e pai de três filhos de idades compreendidas entre sete e 13 anos. Estudou ate 2 classe devido à guerra civil que terminou em 1992.
Vive em boane com sua família mais um sobrinho na casa propria.
Saiu de vilanculos de com o seu cunhado para maputo e começou por trabalhar nas machambas de boane e depois numa empresa cerâmica e de fabrico de tijolos refrato rios durante 10 anos.
Já passam, também, 10 anos que parou de trabalhar para abrasar o negocio de venda de materiais de construção aos moradores de boane e outros clientes em transito.
Trabalha cerca de 12 horas por dia e tem 1 empregado. Vende mais ferros de varias medidas para construção e consegue poupar, mais ou menos, 4.500,00MT. Com outra parte dos rendimentos, custeia despesas correntes.
Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku-Adsema e nunca teve outros créditos com outros bancos. Já levantou valores de 15.200,00MT e 16.800,00MT, todos aplicados no reforço do negocio, e com o actual credito de 25.000,00MT pretende reforçar o negocio e para poder satisfazer a demanda de produtos.
Propõe se a pagar bem para poder aceder a outros empréstimos para no futuro aumentar a sua ferragem.
texts.en:
José Safrão T. was born in the district of Vilanculos (northern Inhambane province). He is 37 years old and married, with three children between the ages of seven and thirteen. He attended school through second grade, when the civil war that ended in 1992 forced him to abandon his studies. He lives in Boane in his own house with his family and a nephew. He left Vilanculos with his brother-in-law and went to Maputo to work first in the agricultural fields of Boane and then for 10 years with a manufacturer of ceramics and bricks. It's been another 10 years since he stopped working there to start a business selling construction materials to the residents of Boane and other clients who are passing through. He works about 12 hours a day and has one employee. He also sells various kinds of construction tools, and manages to bring in about 4,500 MT. With a portion of that revenue, he is able to cover recurring expenses. This is his third loan with Hluvuku-Adsema, and he's never had loans from other banks. He's already repaid loans of 15,200 and 16,800 MT, which both went toward strengthening his business. With the current loan of 25,000 MT requested, he plans to beef up his business in order to satisfy the demand for products. He intends to be responsible with his payments in order to be able to qualify for loans in the future and expand his hardware store.

Translated from Portuguese by Andrea Rosenberg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase stock in his shop

loans.name: Zikrillo

texts.ru: Бобиев Зикрилло проживает в районе Курган-Тюбе. Возраст 25 лет. Женат, имеет 1 ребенка. Зикрилло более 7 лет занимается торговлей. Он имеет торговую точку, где в основном торгует продуктами питания. Клиент просит кредит, для увеличения товараоборота.
texts.en:
Zikrillo B. lives in Kurgan-Tube region. He is 25 years old, married and has one child. Zikrillo has over seven years trading. He has a shop which mostly sells food. He is requesting a loan in order to increase his trade turnover.

Translated from Russian by Josh Machleder, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase of trade turnover

loans.name: Zulhumor

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 


Амонова  Зулхумор  -  женщина  1966  года  рождения,  замужем,  имеет  одного  ребёнка.  В  центре  города  она  имеет  компьютерный  центр,  где  она  оказывает  компьютерные  услуги.  Она  начала  бизнес  с  одного  компьютера,  так  как  она  не  имела  достаточно  средств.  Постепенно,  накопив  денег,  она  расширила  свой  центр  и  увеличила  число  компьютеров  до  пяти,  а  также  приобрела  ксерокс.  Основными  её  посетителями  являются  студенты  и  школьники.  Её  муж  Гулов  Гулмахмад  работает  агрономом  в  дехканском  хозяйстве  и  помогает  ей  развивать  бизнес.
texts.en:
Zulhumor A. is a woman, she was born in 1966, is married and has one child. In the town center she has a computer center where she provides computer services. She started a business with just one computer because she did not have enough financial means. Gradually by saving money she has expanded her center and increase the number of computers to five and also bought a Xerox machine. Her customers mainly consist of school and college students. Her husband Gulmahmad Gulov works as an agronomist in the farm and helps her to develop her business.

MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a computer

loans.name: Биробия

texts.ru: Биробия - молодая женщина 1975 года рождения. Замужем и имеет 3-х детей. Они с мужем работают в столовой Политехнического Университета города Худжанда. Муж поставляет ежедневно свежие продукты а Биробия готовит разные блюда, национальные и европейские. У них ежедневно очень много клиентов. В основном все студенты этого Университета обедают у Биробии и преподаватели тоже. Биробия планирует готовить десерты и поэтому просит займ для закупки сырья.
texts.en:
Birobiya is a young woman, born in 1975. She's married and has 3 children. She and her husband work in the dining hall at the Polytechnic University in the city of Khujand. Every day her husband delivers fresh produce and Birobiya prepares a variety of traditional and European dishes. They have a lot of customers every day. Typically all the university students, as well as the teachers, eat at Birobiya's. Birobiya is planning to prepare desserts, so she's requesting a loan to purchase ingredients.

Translated from Russian by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy supplies for her cafeteria.

loans.name: Renaldo Baptista

texts.pt:
Renaldo Baptista P. nasce na cidade de maputo, tem 40 anos de idade, casado, pai de um filho de um ano. Freqüentar 10 classe na escola secundaria local. Não sustenta mais ninguém da família.
Vive na cidade no bairro da Liberdade (a 15 km de Boane) e trabalha na barragem dos pequenos libombos de boane a 17anos como observador de agua e neste momento ganha 5.300,00MT que usa no sustento da família assim como pagamento do credito.
Este é o seu quarto empréstimo com a hluvuku. Os outros empréstimos foram todos aplicados na construção da sua casa de material convencional. Levantou 10.000,00MT; 14.000,00MT; 14.500,00MT.
Com o credito actual no valor de 20.000,00MT pretende também aplicar na compra de materiais de construção.
Nunca teve empréstimos com outros bancos e ouviu falar da hluvuku através de colegas de serviços.
Compromete se a pagar sem problemas para no futuro, depois de concluir a casa, comprar uma viatura para transporte pessoal e bens.
texts.en:
Renaldo Baptista P. was born in the city of Maputo. He is 40 years old and married, with a one-year-old son. He attended school through the tenth grade. He does not financially support any other family members. He lives in the Liberdade neighborhood (15 km from Boane) and has worked at the Pequenos Libombos Dam as a water oibserver for 17 years. He currently earns 5,300 MT, which he uses to support his family and pay off his loans. This is his fourth loan with Hluvuku. The other loans were all used to build his house with standard materials. He borrowed 10,000 MT, 14,000 MT, and 14,500 MT. The current loan of 20,000 MT will also be used to purchase building materials. He's never had a loan with another bank and heard about Hluvuku through colleagues at work. He is committed to making his payments on time so that in the future, after the house is finished, he can buy a vehicle for personal use.

Translated from Portuguese by Andrea Rosenberg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr:
MADAME KHADY D. est une femme très courageuse qui fait toujours des activités génératrices de revenu pour gérer sa famille
elle fait du commerce de tissus qu'elle achète en gambie et fait également de la restauration chez elle:avec ce pret ,elle envisage de renforcer son activité
texts.en:
Ms. KHADY D. is a very courageous woman who is always working to earn an income in order to manage her family. She does commerce in fabrics that she buys from Gambia. She is also in the restaurant business in her home. With this loan, she envisions bolster her business.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Cloth and food catering

loans.name: Murod

texts.en:
K. Murod is a 49-year-old married man and the loving father of four children. For 13 years Murod has had a small shop near his house where he sells all kinds of household and foodstuff items. His children (one of them is pictured) help him with the business. He dreams that his children will enter higher education, and that is why he is working hard, together with his wife who always assists him in everything. Murod's business is successful in bringing considerable income to the family. Today Murod wants to expand his business and to increase his working capital for purchasing new goods to sell. With this purpose he is requesting a loan of 10,000 TJS. Murod has had loans from Kiva partner IMON several times already and has demonstrated that he is a reliable client. Murod promises to manage this loan reliably as well.  

More about Tajikistan
Tajikistan, a key post on the Silk Road, is perhaps best known for its rich history. It was the location for the end of Alexander the Great's rule, and is known for its great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets such as Rudaki, Ibn Sina (Avicenna), Firdousi, Omar Haiyam, Jomi, Mavlavi Rumi and many others. The country, with its epic mountain passes, is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language and a civilization that dates back to the fourth millennium BC. Even today, it is a complex mix of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

However, Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the USSR, damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93 per cent of the country is mountainous and only 7 per cent of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands of people to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

More about IMON International
Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low-income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit www.imon.tj

loans.use: To increase his working capital for purchasing goods to sell

loans.name: Karomatullo

texts.ru: Косимов Кароматулло проживает в районе Курган-Тюбе. Возраст 43 года. Женат, имеет 5 детей. Один сын находится на заработках в России. Кароматулло 5 лет работал учителем. Теперь он производит лепешки для продажи. Клиент просит кредит, чтобы закупить сырье для производства.
texts.en:
Karomatullo K. lives in Kurgan-Tube region. He is 43 years old, married, and has five children. One of his sons lives and works in Russia to support the family back home. Karomatullo worked for five years as a teacher, and now he makes bread which he sells. He is requesting a loan to purchase the ingredients for his bread.

Translated from Russian by Josh Machleder, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of ingredients

loans.name: Teresa Saide

texts.pt:
Teresa Saide V. nasceu na cidade da matola, de 43 anos de idade, casado e mãe de 3 filhos que já não estudam e com idades compreendidas entre 22 e 27 anos.
Teresa parou de estudar na 2 classe devido a dificuldade financeira dos seus pais.
Vive em boane na casa própria e seu esposo com mais 2 enteado.
É vendedeira de roupa usada que compra na cidade de maputo a 2.500,00MT cada fardo e o seu rendimento mensal são de 3.500,00MT que usa para custeiar as despesas correntes. Vive na casa própria. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo com a Hluvuku-Adsema que obteve informações através de amigos e nunca teve credito com outros bancos.
Com o primeiro credito de 20.000,00MT conseguiu aumentar o volume do seu negocio e o actual empréstimo no valor de 15.000,00MT vai aplicar na diversificação dos produtos para ganhar mais e satisfazer aos clientes da zona. 
Propõe se a pagar sem problemas para poder aceder a mais empréstimos para no futuro construir uma casa para arrendar.
texts.en:
Teresa Saide V. was born in the city of Matola. She is 43 years old and married, and has 3 children, now out of school, between 22 and 27 years old. Teresa had to leave school in second grade because of her family's financial difficulties. She lives in Boane in her own home, with her husband and two stepchildren. She sells secondhand clothing, which she buys in the city of Maputo for 2,500 MT a bundle. Her monthly income is 3,500 MT, which she uses to cover living expenses. She lives in her own home. This is her second loan with Hluvuku-Adsema, which she heard about through friends. She's never had a loan with another bank. She used her first loan of 20,000 MT to increase the size of her business, and the current loan of 15,000 MT will be used to diversify the products she offers in order to earn more and satisfy local customers. She intends to make her payments on time so that she can qualify for more loans in the future and build a house to rent out.

Translated from Portuguese by Andrea Rosenberg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase stock in her shop

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua M. is married to a fisherman and they have four children. She has received no formal education. Efua sells fish and provisions at New Takoradi, and has been in the fish-selling business since 2007. Her loan will be used to buy more fish and provisions for resale to expand her business. She is responsible for paying her children's school fees and her household expenses, and she hopes to use the new profits from her expanded business to pay these.

loans.use: To buy more fish and provisions for resale

loans.name: Muminjon

texts.en:
O. Muminjon is 42 years old and married with three children. For more than six years Muminjon has been baking 'lepeshka', the national bread. His business is profitable and not subject to seasonality. Muminjon gets up early to bake the lepeshka so that people have fresh bread on their tables for breakfast. All of the input materials such as flour, salt and yeast he purchases in the local market. Now, due to high demand, Muminjon wants to increase the amount of bread he is baking. He is therefore requesting a loan of 2000 TJS to purchase flour, and coal for baking the lepeshka. Muminjon deeply appreciates the trust and support you are giving him.

More about Tajikistan
Tajikistan, a key post on the Silk Road, is perhaps best known for its rich history. It was the location for the end of Alexander the Great's rule, and is known for its great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets such as Rudaki, Ibn Sina (Avicenna), Firdousi, Omar Haiyam, Jomi, Mavlavi Rumi and many others. The country, with its epic mountain passes, is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language and a civilization that dates back to the fourth millennium BC. Even today, it is a complex mix of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

However, Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the USSR, damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93 per cent of the country is mountainous and only 7 per cent of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands of people to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

More about IMON International
Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low-income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit www.imon.tj

loans.use: To purchase flour and coal for baking bread

loans.name: Papa Medoune

texts.fr: papa médoune D. est un enseignant qui loge au quartier cité senghor avec sa famille ;aprés les cours il est associé à un de ses collègues pour mener une activité d'aviculture depuis plus de trois ans;avec ce pret,il veut renforcer son fonds de roulement pour améliorer ses revenus
texts.en:
Papa Médoune D. is a teacher staying in the Cité Senghor district with his family. After classes are over, he joins one of his colleagues to run a poultry farming business of three years. With this loan, he wants to boost his working capital in order to improve his revenues.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Poultry farming

loans.name: Nafisa

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 


Одинаева Нафиса – женщина  29-ти  лет,  замужем,  имеет  одного ребёнка. Она  вместе  со  своим  мужем   больше  двух  лет  занимается  продажей  сахара  и  макаронных  изделий и других продуктов питания. Возле своего дома они имеют маленький магазинчик,который пользуется хорошим спросом у соседей.  В начале  своей  деятельности  она  брала  товар  под  реализацию  у  оптовиков.  Благодаря  нашему  кредиту  она  получила  возможность  ездить  в  город  Худжанд  и  покупать  товар  за  наличность  по  выгодным  ценам. Нафиса очень  рада  сотрудничеству  с  нами  и  благодарна  нашим  кредиторам  за  помощь  в  осуществлении  её  планов.
texts.en:
Nafisa O. is a 29-year-old woman. She is married and has one infant. For more than two years, she together with her husband has engaged in selling sugar, macaroni products and other food products. Near their home, they have a little store that is in good demand by neighbors. In the beginning of her activities, she brought goods accessed through a middleman. Thanks to the loan, she received the opportunity to travel to the city of Khujand and to purchase goods for her stock at advantageous prices. Nafisa is very happy with the collaboration with MLF MicroInvest and is thankful for the loan that has helped her realize her plans. MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy granulated sugar

loans.name: Hope

texts.en: Hope A. sells second-hand fridges. She has been in this business for a long time. She is married with 5 children and she is 50 years old. She is requesting the loan amount of N 150,000 to purchase more second-hand fridges to sell. Hope says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more second-hand fridges to sell

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose T. sells sarongs. She is married with a child and she is 40 years old. She is requesting the loan amount of N 100,000 to purchase more sarongs to sell. Rose says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more sarongs to sell

loans.name: Dina

texts.en: Dina O. is a widow and has 4 children. She has received schooling through Junior High School. Dina sells fish and onions at New Takoradi. She has been in this business since 1999. Dina will use the loan to buy more fish and onions for resale. With the new profits from her expanded business, Dina plans to reinvest to increase her capital and profit to enable her pay her children’s school fees and her household expenses.

loans.use: to buy more fish and onions for resale.

loans.name: Mavchuda

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Мавчуда закончила свой кредит без проблем и хочет получить повторно кредит для закупа летних сарафанчиков для девочек.У неё очень большой ассортимент детской одежды, но для девочек маловат.На снимке Мавчуда на месте деятельности.
texts.en:
Mavchuda finished her loan with problems and wants to receive a follow-up loan. With the new loan, she wants to buy summer dresses for girls. She has a very large assortment of children's clothing, but less so for girls. In the picture, Mavchuda is in the place of her business. MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase children's clothing

loans.name: Kudratullo

texts.ru: Кудратулло Самадов проживает в районе Курган-Тюбе. Возраст 30 лет. Женат, имеет 3 детей. Кароматулло более 9 лет занимается животноводством, он откармливает и продает крупно рогатый скот. Клиент просит кредит, чтобы закупить крупно рогатый скот для откармливания и продажи.
texts.en:
Kudratullo S. lives in Kurgan-Tube region. He is 30 years old, married, and has three children. Karomatullo has over nine years of experience in animal husbandry, raising and selling cattle. He is requesting a loan to buy cattle which he will feed and sell.

Translated from Russian by Josh Machleder, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of cattle

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria K. sells fish at New Takoradi. Victoria has received Junior high school education.  She is married and has 5 children.  Victoria has been selling fish since 2004. She is responsible for paying school fees and house-keeping expenses. Her loan will be used to buy more fish for resale.  She hopes to use the new profits from her business to reinvest and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish for resale

loans.name: Nuriniso

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 
Нуринисо удачно закончила кредит и хочет получить повторный, на закуп летних спортивных маек и шорт.Она ланирует получив кредит съездить в Истаравшан.
texts.en:
Nuriniso successfully completed her loan and wants to receive a second one. She will use the loan to purchase sporty summer tank tops and shorts. She plans to receive a loan to travel to Istaravshan. MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase additional men's clothing for sale

loans.name: Mabel

texts.en: Mabel E. sells foodstuffs retail to her customers. She is married with 5 children and she is 38 years old. She is requesting the loan amount of N100,000 to purchase more foodstuffs to sell. Mabel says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: Charity

texts.en: Charity O. owns a salon and she also sells cosmetics and hair extensions. She is married without any children and she is 27 years old. She is requesting the loan amount of N100,000 to purchase more cosmetics to sell. Charity says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Nukrabi

texts.ru: Нукраби Мирзоева проживает в районе Курган-Тюбе. Возраст 40 лет. Замужем, имеет 4 детей. Муж находится в России на заработках. Нукраби более 3 лет занимается животноводством. Клиентка просит кредит, чтобы закупить крупно рогатый скот, для откармливания и продажи.
texts.en:
Nukrabi M. lives in the Qurgan-Tube district. She is 40 years old, married and has 4 children. Her husband is working in Russia. Nukrabi has been involved in animal husbandry for over 3 years. Our client is requesting this loan in order to buy cattle to feed and resell.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of cattle

loans.name: Nagriza

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Наргиза Отаназарова 1977 года рождения,замужем, имеет двоих детей. C малых лет Наргиза любила шить и мечтала открыть своё ателье.Сейчас она шьёт на заказ портьеры и занавески европейского стиля.Они пользуются хорошим спросом среди населения.Для расширения своего бизнеса Наргиза обратилась в нашу организацию. Она рада сотрудничеству с нами и благодарит наших партнёров по КИВА.
texts.en:
Nagriza O. was born in 1977. She's married and has two children. Since she was very small she has liked to sew and has dreamed of opening her own sewing studio. At present she makes custom European-style curtains and drapes, and profits by their high demand. She is seeking assistance from our organization to expand her business. Nagriza is very glad to be associated with us and thanks our partners at Kiva.

Translated from Russian by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sewing accessories

loans.name: Ibrohim

texts.ru: Абдуллоев Иброхим проживает в районе Курган-Тюбе. Возраст 45 лет. Женат, имеет 3 детей. Иброхим более 6 лет занимается животноводством. Старший сын находится в России на заработках. Абдуллоев просит кредит, для закупа крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en:
Ibrohim A. lives in the Qurgan-Tube district. He is 45 years old, married and has 3 children. Ibrohim has been involved in animal husbandry for over 6 years. His oldest son works in Russia. Ibrohim is requesting this loan in order to buy cattle.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of cattle

loans.use: To purchase more bags of poultry feed to sell

MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Шахноза Махкамова-молодая женщина 27-ми лет, замужем,имеет одного ребёнка.
Её муж Каримов Хомиджон занимается куплей и продажей скота на скотном рынке. А она откармливает крупнорогатый скот дома. Её муж помогает ей  с куплей-продажей скота, потому что хочет расширить  семейный  бизнес пока она сидит  с их маленьким сыном. За счет займа они хотят увеличить количество скота и  получить больше прибыли.Они рады ,что обратились в нашу организацию за финансовой помощью.
texts.en:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Shahnoza M. is a young woman of 27 years of age, she is married and has one child. Her husband Homidjon Karimov buys and sells cattle on the market. She feeds the cattle at home. Her husband helps her with the buying and selling of the cattle because he wants to expand their family business while she stays at home with their small son. They want to use the loan to increase the head count of cattle and get more profit. They are happy that they came to our organization for the financial help.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a calf

texts.en: Obus A. plaits hair and she also sells hair extensions. She is married with 6 children and she is 48 years old. She is requesting the loan amount of N50,000 to purchase more hair extensions to sell. Obus says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more rubber shoes to sell

loans.name: Safar

texts.ru: Абдуллоев Сафар проживает в районе Курган-Тюбе. Возраст 60 лет. Женат, имеет 6 детей. Сафар более 10 лет занимается животноводством. Его дети также помогают отцу. Клиент просит кредит, чтобы закупить крупно рогатого скота для откармливания и продажи.
texts.en:
Safar A. lives in the Qurgan-Tube district. He is 60 years old, married and has 6 children. Safar has been involved in animal husbandry for over 10 years. His children help him with the business. Our client is requesting this loan in order to buy cattle to feed and resell.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy A. is 34 years old and is married with one child. She has a salon where she creates lovely hairstyles for her customers, and where she also sells hair extensions and drinks. Mercy is requesting the loan amount of 100,000 NGN to purchase more drinks and salon products to sell. Mercy sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more drinks and salon products to sell

loans.name: Nazokat

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Баротова Назокат –женщина 41 года , замужем ,имеет 4-х детей. Вместе  со  своим  мужем Махмудовым Дилмуродом  она  занимается откормом и   купле - продажей  скота.  Кроме  того  она  имеет  свой  огород,  где  выращивает  овощи  и  продаёт  их  на  рынке.  Недавно  от  своих  соседей  она  узнала  о  нашей  организации  и  решила  у  нас  кредитоваться.  Теперь  Назокат  наша  клиентка  и  рада  сотрудничеству  с  нами. На полученный займ она планирует купить корову и там самым расширить свой товарооборот. В  ближайшее  время  она  планирует  выдать  старшую  дочь  замуж.
texts.en:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Nazokat B. is a 41 year old woman, she is married and has four children. Together with her husband Dilmurod Mahmudov she feeds, buys and sells cattle. Besides this she also has own garden where she grows vegetables and sells them on the market. She has recently found out from her neighbors about our organization and decided to take out a loan. Right now Nazokat is our client and is glad to be working with us. She plans to use the loan to buy a cow and increase her turnaround this way. In the nearest future she plans to get her daughter married.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a cow

MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Каримов Вайдулло- мужчина 54-х лет, женат, имеет троих детей.У Вайдулло высшее техническое образование,он работает оператором в АО"телеком".Он очень любит свою работу,но чтобы прокормить семью ему нужен дополнительный источник дохода.Так как с детства он помогал родителям разводить скот и имеет опыт в этом бизнесе ,он решил заняться откормом и купле-продажей скота.Постепенно накопив капитал он расширил свой товарооборот.Узнав про нашу организацию он рашил получить займ и купить молодого бычка для откорма.
texts.en:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Vaydullo K. is a 54 year old man, he is married and has three children. Vaydullo has a higher technical education, he works as an operator in AO Telecom. He loves his job very much, but he needs additional source of income to feed the family. When he was younger he helped his parents breed the cattle and has experience in this business. He decided to start feeding cattle and selling it. Gradually he has saved some capital and expanded his turnaround. He found out about our organization and decided to get a loan and buy a young calf for feeding.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cattle

She had been employed in a similar shop previously where she gained two years of experience in the field.
