Her stock of "pagnes" is down, and at the same time, some of her stock of grocery items went bad. She wants to replenish her inventory and is asking WAGES for a loan to buy 15 lengths of "pagne" and various staple goods.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase of "pagnes" and staple goods for resale

loans.name: Jumagul

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 




Жумагул успешно закончила свой кредит и смогла увеличить оборотный капитал скота.Она планирует в дальнейшем получив кредит хочет оптом закупить корм для скота и две молодые коровы. На снимке Чумагул в день выдачи.
texts.en:
Jumagul successfully repaid her loan and was able to increase her livestock working capital. She plans to use the next loan to buy livestock feed wholesale and two young cows in the future. The photograph shows Jumagul on the disbursement day.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Wholesale purchase of livestock feed

loans.name: Aissatou

texts.fr: AISSATOU N. est une femme mariée et mère de trois enfants ;elle fait du commerce pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille ,son activité consiste à aller à rosso pour acheter des tissus et  des produits alimentaires pour les revendre sur le marché local;avec la somme qu'elle demande,elle envisage d'augmenter son fonds de roulement
texts.en:
Aissatou N. is a married woman and the mother of 3 children. She works selling goods to support her family. Her business consists in going to Rosso to buy cloth and foodstuffs to re-sell on the local market. With the sum that she has requested, she intends to add to her working capital.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: sale of cloth and foodstuffs

loans.name: Abdulhamid

texts.ru: Абдулхамид Саидов проживат в городе Куляб. Возраст 40 лет. Женат, имеет 3 детей.  Абдулхамид по образованию является инженером. Он более 7 лет заниается услугой такси. Клиент просит кредит, чтобы отремонтировать свою машину, т.к. этот вид услуги является единственным источником дохода.
texts.en:
Abdulhamid S. lives in the city of Kulob. He is 40 years old, married and has 3 children. Abdulhamid is an engineer by trade. He has been working as a taxi driver for over 7 years. Our client is requesting this loan in order to repair his car since this business is his sole source of income.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Car repair

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Naqibullah

texts.en:
The man who is pictured is Naqibullah, the son of K.. He is resident of Kabul, Afghanistan. He is 35, married, and the father of 4 children, who are still small. He is in the business of selling wood. He is happy working there. He would like to open a shop and increase his business, so he has requested an individual loan of 30000 Afghani to buy all the requirements to progress his business.
He his happy that effective processes, such as kiva’s, exist in the world to support entrepreneurs.

loans.use: Progressing his business.

loans.name: Segnon Mari

texts.fr:
Cette femme exerce comme activité génératrice de revenu le commerce d’objets plastiques, elle fait son commerce de façon ambulante. Elle vend dans les maisons et dans les marchés, elle dispose aussi de certains clients dans son quartier. Faisant face actuellement à une baisse de stock elle veut se réapprovisionner et sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour acheter des objets en plastiques.
Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants.
texts.en:
This woman earns a living selling plastic ware. She sells door-to-door. She sells in neighborhoods and in the markets. She also has some steady customers in her own neighborhood. Since her inventory is presently low, she would like to replenish it and is asking WAGES for a loan to buy plastic goods.

She is married and the mother of 3 children.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase of items made of plastic

loans.name: Halima

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 
Халима хочет получить повторный кредит.Она использует займы на расширение бизнеса животноводства.Сейчас у неё 25 голов коз и три коровы.На следующий кредит она планирует закупить корм для скота и пару молодых породистых коров.
texts.en:
Halima wants to obtain another loan. She uses her loans to expand her animal husbandry business. She currently has 25 heads of goats and three cows. Halima plans to use her next loan to purchase feed for the livestock and a couple of purebred cows.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of livestock feed and two purebred cows

loans.name: Mabel

texts.en: Mabel L., a 46-year-old married mother of three children, sells sarongs of various colors. She hopes for the loan amount of N100,000 to purchase more sarongs to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more sarongs to sell.

loans.name: Aissatou

texts.fr: Aissatou D., 35 ans est mariée avec 04 enfants en charge. Elle veut renforcer sa vente de tissus teintés, de légumes et de mil. Cette activité lui a permis de réaliser l'achat de bétail pour améliorer ses revenus et les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en:
Aissatou D., 35, is married with 4 children for whom she is responsible. She wants to bolster her little business selling hand-dyed cloth, vegetables and millet. This business has allowed her to purchase livestock to improve her income and the living conditions of her family.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: sale of dyed cloth, vegetables and millet

loans.name: Mamadou

texts.fr: mr M. est un enseignant de profession,il est marié et est père de trois enfants et loge au quartier cité senghor de thiès ,après les heures de classe il fait de l'aviculture pour diversifier ses sources de revenu;il a eu à rembourser son premier pret sans difficulté et sollicite un autre pret pour renforcer son fonds de roulement
texts.en:
Mr. M. is a professional teacher. He is married and the father of 3 children. They live in the Cité Senghor neighborhood in Thiès. After teaching his classes, he raises poultry to diversify his sources of revenue. He managed to reimburse his first loan without difficulty and is now asking for another loan to bolster his working capital.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: raising poultry

loans.name: Rupiyamo

texts.ru: Рупиямо Саидова живет в городе Душанбе. Возраст 40 лет. Разведена, имеет 2 детей. Рупиямо имеет торговую точку на рынке, где более 10 лет занимается торговлей. Она в основном торгует детской одеждой. Клиентка хочет получить кредит, чтобы увеличить товараоборот.
texts.en:
Rupiyamo S. lives in the city of Dushanbe. She is 40 years old, divorced and has 2 children. Rupiyamo has a retail stand at the market, where she has been selling for over 10 years. She primarily sells children’s clothing. Our client wants to obtain this loan in order to increase her goods turnover.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increasing goods turnover

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Masoli

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 
Масоли мужчина, который очень честный и пунктуальный по поводу погашения своих кредитов.Он использует кредит для увеличения оборотного капитала бизнеса животноводства.Масоли сам работает бригадиром на стройке.Сейчас у него пять коров и несколько голов баранов.На будущее он планирует расширить хлев для скота и прибавить ещё коров.
texts.en:
Masoli is a very honest and punctual man when it comes to repaying his loans. He uses credit to increase his animal husbandry business working capital. Masoli also works as a construction foreman. He currently has five cows and several heads of sheep. In the future, Masoli wants to expand his livestock shed and add more cows.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Livestock feeding and sales

loans.name: Mastura

texts.ru: Мастура 1946 года рождения , имеет единственного сына. Она работает поваром в Детском доме. Также подрабатывает на рынке продавая коктейли и попкорн.  Ей в торговле помогает невестка. (На фото ее невестка) Она сидит пока Мастура на работе. Мастура имеет 3 внука , старшая внучка выходит скоро замуж. Она решила сделать свадебный подарок курпа –национальный матрас. Сейчас сезон прохладительных напитков и у нее бизнес идет хорошо, вот она решила увеличить свой оборот за счет получившего кредита. И от оборота хочет получить хорошую прибыль. На накопившую прибыль  она и купит тот подарок который хочет сделать своей внучке.
texts.en:
Mastura was born in 1946 and has one son. She works as a cook at the orphanage. She also sells smoothies and popcorn at a market. Her daughter-in-law helps her with the sales (the photograph shows her daughter-in-law). She fills in while Mastura is at work. Mastura has 3 grandchildren, and her oldest granddaughter is getting married soon. Mastura decided to give a kurpa, which is a traditional mattress, as a wedding gift. Now is the season for chilled beverages, and her business is going well. So she decided to increase her turnover using this loan. And she wants to make a good profit from the turnover. Mastura, then, will buy her granddaughter’s wedding present, using the resulting profit.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase turnover

loans.name: Gulbonu

texts.ru: Гулбону Сафарова имеет торговую точку на рынке, где более 12 лет торгует продуктами питания. Проживает она в городе Куляб. Возраст 38 лет. Разведена, имеет 3 детей.  Т.к. Гулбону  ей тяжело одной она просит кредит, для увеличения товараоборота, отсюда следует увеличится и доход.
texts.en:
Gulbonu S. has a retail stand at the market, where she has been selling food products for over 12 years. She lives in the city of Kulob. She is 38 years old, divorced and has 3 children. Because it is difficult for Gulbonu by herself, she is requesting a loan to increase product turnover and, subsequently, increase her profit.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increasing product turnover

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Munuka Group

texts.en:
Rukia R., 33, is married with two children ages, 13  and 1.  She has a salon business at a place called Mazambalauni, some few kilometers from the city centre. She started this business about 10 years ago.  She works from 8am to 7pm daily. She is able to earn a monthly profit of around $191.

This will be Rukia’s 7th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to increase on the business, bought a fridge for keeping juice for selling at a nearby school and paid college fees for her your sister and has paid back her loan successfully.  She wants to use the new loan to increase on capital and to save half in the bank..

Rukia  will share this loan with her group  Munuka, which totals 16 members; The members hold each other accountable in paying back their loans. In the picture, Rukia is 1st on the right.

loans.use: To buy grocery stock.

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Ce monsieur n’a pas fait l’université faute de moyens, devant subvenir à ses propres besoins il a fait une formation en secrétariat bureautique et a ouvert après sa formation sa propre boutique de traitement de texte et d’impression. Il veut agrandir son commerce en alimentant sa boutique avec des fournitures de bureau, la vente de cartes de recharges et des services téléphoniques. Ainsi il pourra réaliser de meilleures recettes. Il demande a WAGES pour cela son premier crédit pour acheter des fournitures de bureau, 2 cartons de cartes de recharges TOGOCEL et une cabine téléphonique.
texts.en:
This gentleman was not able to attend a university since he lacked the means to do so. Being obliged to support himself, he took courses to become a secretary and after his training, he opened his own shop doing word processing and printing. He wants to expand his business by selling office supplies, rechargeable phone cards, and telephone service in his little shop. Thus he will earn more income. He is asking WAGES for his first loan to buy office supplies, 2 boxes of TOGOCEL rechargeable phone cards, and a telephone booth.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase of office supplies, rechargeable phone cards, and a telephone booth

loans.name: Gullomiddin

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 
 

Гулломиддин мужчина в возрасте 48 лет имеет троих детей.Он вместе с женой имеет высшее образование.Сам работает в сельской школе директором , а жена учительница начальных классов.Гулломиддин из-за мизерной заработной платы дополнительно занимается куплей и продажей скота.У него сейчас две коровы и три барана.Для увеличения бизнеса откорма и продажи скота хочет получить в Арванде кредит.На снимке Гулломиддин в день выдачи.
texts.en:
Gullomiddin is 48 years old and has three children. His wife and he have a higher education. He works as a principal at the local school, and his wife is an early grades teacher. Because of the miserly salary, Gullomiddin is also involved in livestock sales. He currently has two cows and three rams. He wants to obtain a loan from Arvand in order to expand his business. The photograph shows Gullomiddin on the disbursement day.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business expansion

loans.name: Mahsadbi

texts.ru: Махсадби Тураева проживает в городе Куляб. Возраст 45 лет. Разведена, имеет 4 детей. Махсадби более 15 лет занимается торговлей, она в основном торгует фруктами и овощами. Клиентка просит кредит, для увеличения товараоборота.
texts.en:
Mahsadbi T. lives in the city of Kulob. She is 45 years old, divorced and has 4 children. Mahsadbi has been involved in sales for over 15 years. She primarily sells fruits and vegetables. Our client is requesting this loan in order to increase product turnover.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increasing product turnover

loans.name: Diénaba

texts.fr: DiénaB. B., 37 ans est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Elle veut renforcer son activité de restauration les jours de marché hebdomadaire et de vente d’huile, de sucre et autres. Ces revenus lui permettent d’acheter du bétail et d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en:
DiénaB. B., 37, is married and the mother of 4 children. She wants to bolster her catering business, selling cooked food on weekly market days and selling oil, sugar, etc. The income permits her to invest in buying livestock and improve living conditions for her family.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: selling cooked food

loans.name: Akosua

texts.en:
Akosua M. sells fresh foodstuffs such as groundnuts (peanuts), rice and peppers in Abortoase. She did not receive any formal education. She is married and has six dependents. Her husband is a trader whose income is not enough to take care of the large family.

Akosua is responsible for paying all the utility bills including high electricity bills. Her loan will be used to buy a variety of the foodstuffs she sells to enable her take care of the large family she has. She hopes to reinvest the new profits from her business.

loans.use: To buy a variety of the foodstuffs she sells

loans.name: Amadou

texts.fr: mr guangué est un commerçant de profession qui a ouvert une alimentation générale au quartier cité senghor de thiès;il dispose d'une forte clientèle qu'il souhaite satisfaire,c'est pour cela qu'il sollicite ce pret  pour renforcer son stock de marchandises
texts.en:
Mr Guangué is a serious merchant who has opened a general store in the Cité Senghor neighborhood in Thiès. He has numerous customers whom he would like to satisfy. For that reason he is requesting a loan so that he can add to his inventory.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: sale of groceries

loans.name: Abduchalil

texts.ru: Абдучалил Хамидов проживает в городе Куляб. Возраст 40 лет. Женат, имеет 4 детей. Абдучалил имеет торговую точку, где более 7 лет занимается торговлей. Он покупает овец, расчленяет и продает их как мясо. Клиент просит кредит, чтобы купить несколько овец.
texts.en:
Abduchalil H. lives in the city of Kulob. He is 40 years old, married and has 4 children. Abduchalil has a retail store, where he has been selling for over 7 years. He buys sheep, slaughters it and sells the meat. Our client is requesting this loan in order to buy a few sheep.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of livestock

loans.name: Boijonboi

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 


Махмудов  Бойжонбой – молодой  человек  1983  года  рождения,  женат,  имеет  одного  ребёнка,  образование  среднее.  Недавно  он  обратился  в  нашу  организацию  за  кредитом  для  расширения  своего  фотосалона,  который  находится  в  центре  Джаббор-Расуловского  района.  Для  успешного  ведения  своего  дела  он  решил  приобрести  принтер  для  распечатки  цветных  фотографий. Кроме  фотоуслуг  Бойжонбой  оказывает  услуги  ксерокопирования.  Он  рад,  что  наша  организация  выделила  ему  кредит  и  намерен  продолжить  сотрудничество.
texts.en:
Born in 1983, Boijonboi M. is a young man, who is married and has one child. He has a secondary education. Recently, he reached out to our organization for a loan in order to expand his photo studio, which is located in the center of the Jabbor-Rasulov district. To continue his business success, he decided to purchase a color photo printer. Besides photography, Boijonboi offers copying services. He is glad that our organization offered him a loan and plans to continue the partnership.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Printer purchase

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr:
FATOU S. est une femme mariée agée d'une cinquantaine d'année et qui est très active;elle est membre de la mutuelle depuis six ans et a toujours remboursé ses prets sans difficulté
elle vend du petit déjeuner,des tissus et diverses autres marchandises;elle demande un nouveau pret pour renforcer son fonds de roulement
texts.en:
Fatou S. is a married woman around 50 who is very active. She has been a member of the credit union for 6 years and has always reimbursed her loans without difficulty.

She sells breakfast, cloth, and various other merchandise. She is asking for a new loan to add to her working capital.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to add to her working capital

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph N. is married and has four dependents. He has received schooling through junior high. His wife is a petty trader who earns a little for a living.

Joseph sells small fishing accessories to fisherman in Abotoase near Hohoe. Joseph uses all his income in the payment of his dependents’ school fees and other utility bills of the entire family.

Joseph will use the loan to purchase a fishing net and a bigger boat to go fishing. With the new profits from his expanded business, Joseph plans to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To purchase a fishing net and a bigger boat to go fishing

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Fatou N., 42 ans est mariée avec 05 enfants en charge. Son activité est le petit commerce. Elle veut un prêt pour acheter du riz, de l’huile et du thé pour renforcer son activité et améliorer sa participation dans la prise en charge familiale.
texts.en:
Fatou N., 42, is married and raising 5 children. Her business is petty trading. She wants a loan to buy rice, oil, and tea to bolster her business and be better able to contribute to supporting the family.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: sale of rice, oil, tea, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Sapa Group

texts.en:
Here are Hawanatu T., Abibatu S., Adama K., and Fatmata F.. They are businesswomen in Waterloo small-town, about twenty miles from Freetown city. They named their group Sapa. This is the first loan Sapa group members are receiving from SMT, a Partner of Shine on Sierra Leone. They are requesting a loan of Le 500,000 each to help them develop their businesses. 

Hawanatu T. (left) is the leader of the Sapa group. Hawanatu is twenty-six years of age, single with one child who is still in nursery school. She was born in Lunsar, in northern Sierra Leone. She now lives in Waterloo as a result of the ten-year-long civil war.  Hawanatu has been a businesswoman for three years now. She sells lace, cotton, and uniform materials. She will invest this loan into her business so that it will grow. Hawanatu’s ambition is to become an international businesswoman, she told me.

loans.use: Invest in her business

loans.name: Magaye

texts.fr: magaye est né en 1975 à thiès ;il est célibataire et habite au quartier mbour 3 DE THIES ;il est tailleur de profession et a ouvert son propre au grand marché de thiès depuis 2001,son activité consiste à travailler sur commande et possède une clientèle importante;avec ce pret il envisage d'acheter deux machines à coudre
texts.en:
Magaye was born in 1975 in Thiès. He is single and lives in the Mbour 3 neighborhood of Thiès. He is a professional tailor and opened his own workshop in the big open-air market of Thiès in 2001. His business consists in making garments to order, and he has a big clientele. With this loan he expects to buy two sewing machines.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchasing two sewing machines

loans.name: Abdukarim

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Хайитбаев  Абдукарим  -  мужчина  1964  года  рождения,  женат,  имеет  4-х   детей.  Он  занимается  откормом  и  куплей-продажей  крупнорогатого  скота.  Абдукарим  покупает  молодых  бычков  на  скотных  рынках  района  и  откормив  их  в  течении  3-4  недель,  затем  продаёт  их.  Кроме  того  он  работает  в  дехканском  хозяйстве,  где  имеет  земельный  участок.  Там  он  выращивает  овощи  для  продажи  на  рынке,  а  также  корм  для  скота.  С  целью  расширения  своего  бизнеса  он  обратился  в  нашу  организацию.
texts.en:
Born in 1964, Abdukarim H. is married and has 4 children. He is involved in feeding and sales of cattle. Abdukarim buys young bulls at livestock markets of the district and, having fed them for 3-4 weeks, resells them. Besides the business, he works at a dekhan farm, where he has a plot of land. He grows vegetables for sale at the market and also grows feed for the livestock. Abdukarim reached out to our organization in order to expand his business.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Livestock purchase

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: Awa Dembélé, 42 ans est mariée avec 06 enfants en charge. Elle s’active dans la vente de mil. Le prêt qu’elle sollicite va lui permettre d’acheter le mil en gros  pour le revendre au détail. Elle veut renforcer son commerce et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Awa Dembélé, 42, is married and raising 6 children. She sells millet. The loan that she is requesting will permit her to buy millet wholesale to re-sell retail. She wants to strengthen her business and improve living conditions for her family.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: sale of cereals

loans.name: Mungu Tubariki Group

texts.en:
Elvina N., age 34, is married with two children, ages 17 and 13.  She has a grocery business which she has run since 1996.   She works daily from 4 pm until 10 pm and is able to earn a monthly profit of around $62. 

This will be Elvina's 6th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to increase her business and has paid back her loans successfully.  She would like a new loan to increase stock in her grocery.
 	
Elvina will share this loan with her loan group Mungu Tubariki, which totals 17 members. The members of the group hold each other accountable in paying back their loans. In the picture, Elvina is the 1st on the left.

loans.use: To increase her grocery stock.

loans.name: Murtaza

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Муртаза - мужчина 45 лет. Женат, имеет четырёх детей. Муртаза занимается откормом и продажей крупнорогатого и мелко рогатого скота. Он закупает скот на рынке и откармливая 2-3 месяца продает на том же рынке. Жена занимается переработкой молока, сметаны и продает ее на рынке, и еще помогает по хозяйству дома. Этим она помогает мужу, чтобы их семейный бюджет улучшился. Муртаза в свою очередь хочет увеличить количество своего скота и рад, что кредитуется у нас.
texts.en:
Murtaza is a 45-year-old man. He is married and has four children. Murtaza is involved in feeding and sales of cattle and small livestock. He buys the livestock at a market and, having fed them for 2-3 months, resells it at the market. His wife processes milk and makes sour-cream and sells it at the market. She also helps out with the household. She helps her husband to improve their family budget. Murtaza wants to increase the quantity of his livestock and is happy to be our client.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of livestock

loans.name: Mame Diarra

texts.fr: mame diarra est une jeune fille agée de 27 ans qui fait du commerce pour subvenir à ses besoins personnels;elle s'approvisionne en parfums chez une de ses tantes et les revend au détail chez ses clients ;elle sollicite ce pret pour mieux satisfaire sa clientèle
texts.en:
Mame Diarra is a young woman of 27 who works at selling perfume to support herself. She gets the perfume from one of her aunts and retails it to her customers. She is asking for this loan so that she can satisfy her clientele.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: sale of perfume

loans.name: Egnoname

texts.fr: Cette femme exerce comme activité génératrice de revenu le commerce de pagnes, elle fait ce commerce depuis 2007, elle le fait de façon ambulante ce qui lui permet de trouver tous les jours de nouveaux clients, elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de lomé où le commerce de pagnes est très developpé. A ce jour elle fait face à une baisse de son stock de marchandises. Voulant se réapprovisionner elle sollicite son premier crédit  à  WAGES pour acheter 20 pièces de pagnes de nouveaux modèles.
texts.en:
This woman earns her living selling "pagnes" (lengths of brightly colored African print cloth); she has been in this business since 2007. She makes her sales door-to-door which allows her to find new customers daily. She buys her merchandise in the big open-air market of Lomé where sales of "pagnes" are very well developed. Presently her inventory is low. Wishing to replenish her stock, she is asking for her first loan from WAGES to buy 20 lengths of "pagne" of the latest styles.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase of  "pagnes" for re-sale

loans.name: Komlan

texts.fr:
Ce monsieur habite le quartier d’adidogomé, pour subvenir à  ses propres  besoins il s’est lancé dans le commerce de charbons de bois, la pluie a détruit une partie de son stock de marchandises, ce qui a considérablement diminué ses recettes, pour pouvoir se réapprovisionner il sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour acheter 30 sacs de charbons de bois et assurer le transport de la marchandises.
C’est avec le revenu de son commerce qu’il subvient à ses charges
texts.en:
This gentleman lives in the Adidogomé neighborhood. In order to support himself, he began selling charcoal. The rain destroyed part of his inventory, which has considerably diminished his income. In order to replenish his stock, he is asking WAGES for a loan to buy 30 sacks of charcoal and pay for transport.

It is with the income from his business that he supports himself.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchasing charcoal for re-sale

loans.name: Mor

texts.fr:
MOR D.  est un patissier de profession qui est à la retraite depuis dix ans ,pour entretenir sa famille il fait de l'aviculture avec l'aide de ses enfants ;il a déjà bénéficié d'un crédit qu'il a remboursé sans difficulté
avec ce pret,il envisage de renforcer son stock de poussins pour améliorer sa marge bénéficiaire
texts.en:
Mor D. is a pastry chef by trade. He has been retired for 10 years. To support his family he raises poultry with the help of his children. He has already had one loan that he reimbursed without difficulty.

With this loan, he intends to add to his chicks so that he can make more money.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: raising poultry

loans.name: Nozimjon

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Райимкулов  Нозимжон – молодой  человек  29  лет, женат,  имеет 2-х  детей. Чтобы  прокормить  свою  семью  он  решил  заняться  откормом  скота.  Он  имеет  большой  опыт  в  сфере  животноводства,  так  как    с  юных  лет  помогал  отцу  пасти  скот.  Нозимжону  помогают  его  братья.  Он  закупает  бычков  на  Джаббор-Расуловском скотном  рынке  и,  откормив  в  течении  5-6  месяцев,  перепродаёт  их  за  хорошую  цену.  Кроме  того  он  работает  колхозником  в  дехканском  хозяйстве.
texts.en:
Nozimjon R. is a young man of 29. He is married and has two children. In order to support his family, he decided to engage in the care of cattle. He has a lot of experience in the sphere of tending livestock, since in his young years he helped his father with the cattle in the pasture. Nozimjon is helped in his work by his brothers. He buys calves at the Djabbor-Rasulovski cattle market and, caring for a timeframe of 5-6 months, resells them at a good price. Aside from that, he works as a collective farmer in a dekhan (peasant) farm. -- MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand.” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Gilbert

texts.fr:
Ce monsieur a eu la bonne idée de commencer en 2006 l'activité de ramassage des ordures , cette activité est très rentable pour lui car il détient le monopole dans son activité, ce qui lui permet de réaliser de grosses recettes sur ses services. De plus en en plus de ménages sollicite ses services, il veut alors agrandir son activité et sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour acheter du matériel pour le ramassage des ordures.
Il est marié et a 02 enfants, c’est avec le revenu de son activité qu’il subvient aux charges de sa famille.
texts.en:
This gentleman had the clever idea, in 2006, to begin collecting trash. This work is very profitable for him because he has a monopoly in his sector, which permits him to make a big profit on his service. More and more households are asking for his service, so he wants to expand his business and is asking WAGES for a loan to buy material to use for trash collection.

He is married and has 2 children. He uses the income from his business to support his family.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase of material for trash collection

loans.name: Amy

texts.fr: amy T. est une femme mariee qui a orente son activite vees la petite restauration et qui capitalise plus de cinq ans d'experience dans ce domaine.elle habite dalifort et sa clientele est essentiellement composee de mecaniciens qui exercent leurs activites dans les alentours.elle emprunte une somme de cent mille(100 000)dans le but d'accroitre sa marge beneficiaire en achetant au prix de gros les produits qu'elle utilise pour preparer ses mets ce qui lui permettra aussi de diversifier ses plats pour une meilleure satisfaction des besoins de la clientele.ainsi cette situation pourra lui permettre de mieux faire face a ses charges de location et aussi mieux assister son mari dans l'entretien de la famille et les depenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Amy T. is a married woman who serves cooked food, banking on more than 5 years' experience in this domain. She lives in Dalifort, and her clientele is essentially composed of mechanics who do their work in that area. She is borrowing the sum of 100,000 with the intention of increasing her profit margin by buying the products that she uses to prepare her dishes wholesale. This will also permit her to diversify her dishes so as to satisfy her clientele better. Thus, this situation will allow her to be better able to pay her rent and to help her husband support the family and pay their daily expenses.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: adding to her working capital

loans.name: Guljahon

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Ахмеджонова  Гулжахон  -  женщина  1959 года рождения, замужем, имеет 3-х  детей.  Она  работает  заведующей  детского  сада.  Её муж Юнусов  Умар  занимается куплей и продажей скота на скотном рынке. А она откармливает крупнорогатый скот дома. Её муж помогает ей  с куплей-продажей скота, потому что хочет расширить  семейный  бизнес. За счет займа они хотят увеличить количество скота и  получить больше прибыли.
texts.en:
Guljahon Ahmedjonova was born in 1959, is married and has three children. She works leading a kindergarten. Her husband Umar Yunusov is involved in the purchase and sale of cattle at the livestock market. But she tends bighorn cattle at home. Her husband helps here with purchase-sale of cattle, because he wants to expand the family business. With this loan, they want to increase the quality of their cattle and to receive more profit. --- MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Kurbonjon

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Махмудова  Курвонжон  -  женщина  1954  года  рождения,  замужем,  имеет  2-х  детей.  Работает  врачом  в  центральной  больнице  Джаббор-Расуловского  района.  С  малых  лет  она  имеет  опыт  в  сфере  животноводства,  поэтому  она  помогает  мужу  Абдуразакову  Абдугафуру,  который  занимается  куплей-продажей  скота.  Они  обратились  в  нашу  организацию  за  кредитом.  На  полученные  деньги  они  планируют  купить  телёнка,  откормив  которого  в  течении  3-4  месяцев,  продадут  по  хорошей  цене.
texts.en:
Kurbonjon M. was born in 1954, is married and has two children. She works as a doctor in the central hospital in the Djabbor-Rasulovski region. Since she was young, she has built experience in the sphere of raising animals, therefore she helps her husband Abdugafur Abdurazakov, who is involved in the purchase-sale of cattle. They applied to MLF Microfinance for a loan. Upon receiving the money, they plan to purchase a calf which, in the course of 3-4 months, will sell at a good price. --- MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Gift

texts.en: Gift sells traditional medicine that is produced with natural herbs. The herbs are most effective for blood purification. Gift travels to Ghana to purchase her traditional medicines. Gift is 35 years old and she is married with 2 children. Gift is an active LAPO client. Gift hopes for a loan of N70,000 to purchase more traditional medicines to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase traditional medicines

loans.name: John

texts.en: John A. is a domestic fisherman in Abotoase near Hohoe. John has received primary school education.  He is married and has 5 dependants. His wife is a trader whose income is too small to take care of the family. John is responsible for the financial welfare of his dependants and the family as a whole. His loan will be used to buy a motor for his fishing boat since he has been depending on his strength to paddle the canoes. He hopes to reinvest the profit from his business.

loans.use: To buy a motor for his fishing boat

loans.name: Vali

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 


Мирзоев  Вали – мужчина  1961  года  рождения,  женат,  имеет  3  детей.  Занимается  откормом  и  куплей-продажей  скота.  Недавно  его  жена  Шокирова  Мумина  посоветовала  ему  обратиться  в  нашу  организацию  за  кредитом.  На  полученный  кредит  они  решили  купить  дойную  корову  с  телёнком.  Вали  очень  любит  свою  работу,  так  как  занимается  этим  с  юных  лет.  В  будущем  он  хочет  продолжить  сотрудничество  с  «Микроинвест»  и  на  полученный  займ  он  планирует  расширить  коровник.
texts.en:
Vali M. was born in 1961, is married and has three children. He is engaged in the care and trade of cattle. Recently, his wife Mumina Shokirova advised him to apply for a loan from MLF MicroInvest. Upon receiving the loan, they decided to purchase a dairy cow with a calf. Vali very much likes his work, in that he has been involved in this work since his youth. In the future, he wants to continue collaboration with MicroInvest and upon receiving a loan he plans to expand the cowshed. --- MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase of cattle

loans.name: Lamrana

texts.en:
This is Lamrana S., a local entrepreneur in Waterloo small-town, twenty miles from Freetown. She sells local produce like ground-nuts and beans. She has been in this business for ten years now but her business seems to be growing at a very slow pace. However, with the recent opening of an SMT branch, in partner with Shine on Sierra Leone in Waterloo small-town, Lamrana S. has applied for a loan of Le 3,000,000 to help boost her business.

Lamrana is age thirty-five, married with two children, both of whom are in secondary schools. Her husband is a driver. Lamrana was born in Koya, about forty-four miles from Freetown.  With this loan, she will travel as far as neighboring Guinea to buy local produce wholesale. This will enable her make a better profit, expand her business, and consequently improve her living standard.

loans.use: Buy wholesale produce

loans.name: By God In Power Ii Group

texts.en:
Here are Mariatu B., Isatu C., and Sin K.. They are local entrepreneurs based in Waterloo small-town, twenty miles away from Freetown. They named their group By God in Power. This will be the first loan these entrepreneurs are receiving from SMT/Kiva in Partnership with Shine on Sierra Leone. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make a better profit, and consequently improve their standard of living.

Mariatu B. (right) is the leader of this group. Mariatu is now thirty-one years of age, she was born in Kamakwe town in northern Sierra Leone. She is married to a welder and the two of them have two children who are still in primary school. Mariatu sells toys, raincoats, umbrellas and sneakers. She has been a businesswoman for eight years now. With this loan, she will be able to add more goods to her business, makes better profit, and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: Increase inventory

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en: Vivian sells baby supplies and cosmetics by selling her goods within her community in Lagos state, Nigeria. Vivian is 36 years old and married with 3 children. Vivian hopes for a loan amount of N70,000 to purchase more cosmetics and baby things to sell. She says thank you.

loans.use: To increase inventory

loans.name: By God In Power Group

texts.en:
Here are Amie J., Memuna S., Lama B., Isatu C., and Mabinty M.. They are businesswomen in Waterloo small-town, twenty miles from Freetown city. They named their group By God in Power. This will be the first loan these women are receiving from SMT, a Partner of Shine on Sierra Leone. With this loan, these women will be able to add more goods to their businesses, make a better profit, and consequently improve their standard of living.

Amie J. (left) is the leader of the group. Amie was born in Magburaka town, in northern Sierra Leone. She is now forty years of age. She is married to a businessman and the two have six children together. Some of her children are now in secondary school and others are in primary school. Amie sells palm-oil, the most popular cooking oil, wholesale. She has been a businesswoman since her childhood days.

loans.use: Increase inventory

loans.name: Isaac

texts.en: Isaac A. is married and has 1 child. He has received primary schooling. Isaac is a fisherman in Abotoase, a small fishing community near Hohoe. His wife is a hairdresser whose business is not very big and generates little income. Isaac uses all of his income taking care of the financial responsibility for the child and other housekeeping expenses.  With the high demand for fish in the community and beyond, Isaac will use the loan to purchase a bigger net for fishing. Isaac plans to save the new profits from his expanded business.

loans.use: Purchase a fishing net

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: awa N. est une femme parent beneficiaire qui est connue dans la vente de bonbons elle capitalise six ans d'experience dans ce domaine.pour repondre a l'accroissement de plus en plus importante de la demande awa sollicite un pret de cent mille(100 000)frs pour satisfaire sa clientele.
texts.en:
Awa N. is a woman member and a parent who is known for her sale of candy. She is banking on 6 years of experience in this domain. To meet the growing demand, Awa is requesting a loan of 100,000 frs to satisfy the needs of her clientele.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: adding to her working capital

loans.name: Yaye  Seynabou

texts.fr: yaye seynabou M. est membre de la mutuelle depuis sept ans ;elle est cuisinière à l'hopital régional de thiès ,parallèlement à son travail ,elle fait du commerce qui consiste à acheter des tissus et des produits divers qu'elle revend à ses collègues;avec la somme qu'elle demande,elle envisage de renforcer son stock de marchandises avant l'arrivée de l'hivernage
texts.en:
Yaye Seynabou M. has been a member of the credit union for 7 years; she is a cook at the regional hospital in Thiès. Besides this work, she buys cloth and various products that she re-sells to her colleagues. With the amount she is requesting, she means to expand her stock of merchandise before the beginning of the rainy season.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: adding to her working capital

loans.name: Botir

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 


Джаникулов  Ботир  – мужчина  1959  года  рождения,  женат,  имеет   5  детей.  Занимается  откормом  и  продажей  скота.  Каждое  утро  он  отправляет  скот  на  пастбище  вместе  с  пастухом,  которому  платит  по  договорной  цене.  Его  жена  вместе  с  дочерьми  работает  в  колхозе.  Кроме  того  Джаникулов  Ботир  покупает  у  пастухов  молодых  бычков  по  низкой  цене  и,  откормив,  через некоторое  время  перепродаёт  их  мясникам  по  хорошей  цене.  На  новый  кредит  он  рассчитывает  купить  партию  мелкорогатого  скота  и  отправить  их  на  пастбище  до  осени.  Кроме  того  он  работает  трактористом  в  колхозе.
texts.en:
Botir D. was born in 1959, is married and has five children. He is involved in the care and sale of cattle. Every morning he dispatches the cattle to pasture together with a shepherd, whom he pays an agreed amount. His wife and daughters work in a "kolhoz" (collective farm). Besides that, Botir D. buys young calves from shepherds at low prices, tends them for some time, then resells them to a butcher at a good price. With the new loan, he is considering purchasing a group of small-horn cattle and to send them into the pasture as an investment. Besides this, he works as a tractor operator in a collective farm. --- MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Young Trader Group

texts.en:
Here are Ibraham P., Ramatu C., and Isatu T.. They are local entrepreneurs based in Waterloo small-town, twenty miles from Freetown city. They named their group Young Traders. They are requesting a loan of Le 500,000 each to help them expand their businesses. This loan will be the first these entrepreneurs are receiving from STM/Kiva, a partner of Shine on Sierra Leone. 

Ibraham (middle) is the leader of Young Traders group. Ibraham is age thirty-five. He was born in Freetown, is married to a businesswoman and they have three children together. Two of their children are in primary school and one is still very young. Ibraham started his business only last year. He sells market food wholesale. However, his business is small and cannot meet most of his customers' needs. He has thus applied for a loan from SMT, a partner of Shine on Sierra Leone, to enable him expand his business and be able to meet most of his customers' needs.

loans.use: Purchase more inventory

loans.name: Plan  For Real Group

texts.en:
This is Daniel K., Santigie C., Aminata S. and Salamatu S.. They named their group Plan for Real. These members of Plan for Real group are local entrepreneurs based in the small-town of Waterloo, twenty miles from the city of Freetown.

They are requesting a loan of Le 500,000 each for the first time from SMT, a Partner of Shine on Sierra Leone. With this loan, they will be able to add more goods to their businesses, make better sales, and consequently improve on their standards of living.

Daniel K. (left) is the leader of Plan for Real group. Daniel is now age thirty-two and is married with one child in nursery school. Daniel was born in Binkolo village, in northern Sierra Leone. Daniel sells ice and has been in this business for two years now. With this loan, he will be able to sell more ice in order to meet the growing need of his customers.

loans.use: To invest in his business

loans.name: Big Change Group

texts.en:
This is Mariatu K., Hajaratu K. and Kadiatu K.. They are local entrepreneurs based in the small town of Waterloo, about twenty miles from Freetown city. They named their group Big Change. This will be the first loan these entrepreneurs are receiving from Kiva through SMT, a Partner of Shine on Sierra Leone. With this loan, these ladies will be able to expand their businesses, make better profit and consequently improve their living standard.

Mariatu K. (left) is the leader of the group. Mariatu was born in Freetown city. She is age twenty-nine, married to a driver and the two have two children. One of their children is in primary school and the other in nursery. Mariatu sells ready-to-wear clothes both for men and for women. She has been in this business for five years now.

loans.use: Business capital

loans.name: Davronbek

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

Шукуров  Давронбек  -  мужчина  1954  года  рождения,  женат,  детей  не  имеет.  Он  занимается  откормом  и  куплей-продажей  крупнорогатого  скота.  Давронбек  покупает  молодых  бычков  на  скотных  рынках  района  и  откормив  их  в  течении  3-4  недель,  затем  продаёт  их.  Кроме  того  он  работает  агрономом  в  дехканском  хозяйстве  «Гулхона»,  где  имеет  земельный  участок.  Там  он  выращивает  овощи  для  продажи  на  рынке,  а  также  корм  для  скота.  С  целью  расширения  своего  бизнеса  он  обратился  в  нашу  организацию.
texts.en:
Davronbek S. was born in 1954, is married and has no children. He is involved in the care and trade of bighorn cattle. Davronbek buys young calves at the livestock markets in the region and raises them over the course of 4-5 weeks, then sells them. Besides this, he works as an agriculturalist in the Gulhona dekhan (peasant) farm, where he has a plot of land. There he grows vegetables for sale at the market, and similarly fodder for cattle. With the goal of expanding his business, he applied for a loan from MLF MicroInvest. --- MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: John

texts.en: John N. sells stationeries and provisions such as Milo, milk, sugar and other assorted provisions in Abotoase near Hohoe. John has received tertiary education.  He is married and has 5 dependants. His wife is a petty trader who earns little for a living. He is responsible for taking care of the financial needs of the dependant. His loan will be used to buy more stationery and provisions to sell. He hopes to reinvest the new profits from his business.

loans.use: To buy stationery and provisions for resale

loans.name: Ngozi

texts.en:
Ngozi owns a restaurant where she sells cooked food, drinks and sachet (polythene-bagged) water. She opens her shop from Monday to Saturday from 5 a.m. when she starts cooking until 6 p.m when she closes.

Ngozi is 40 years old and married with six children. She is requesting the loan of N150,000 to purchase more foodstuffs and drinks. She says thank you.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuffs and drinks to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand store inventory

loans.name: Poziljon

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 

 
Валламинов  Позилжон – мужчина  1954  года  рождения,  женат,  имеет  5-х  детей.  Более  10  лет  он  занимается  он  откормом  и  куплей-продажей  скота.  Ему  помогают  его  старшие  сыновья.  На  полученный  займ  он  решил  купить  дойную  корову  и  тем  самым  обеспечить  свою  семью  молоком.  Его  жена  Ахмеджонова  Зухра  продаёт  соседям  излишки  молока  и  пополняет  семейный  бюджет.  Они  рады,  что  обратились  в  нашу  организацию  и  благодарят  наших  партнёров.
texts.en:
Poziljon V. was born in 1954, married and has five children. For more than ten years, he has been involved in the care and trade of cattle. His older sons help him. On receiving the loan, he decided to buy a dairy cow and the same cow provides his family with milk. His wife Zuhra Ahmedjonova sells surplus milk to the neighbors and пополняет the family budget. They are glad that they applied to MLF MicroInvest and are grateful for the partnership. --- MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand” “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan.

Translated from Russian by JD Bergeron, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchasing milk cows

loans.name: Kate

texts.en: Kate sells fruits, drinks and sachet water. Kate uses the same shop with her husband U. who sells televisions. Kate is 32 years old and married with 3 children. Kate hopes for the loan amount of 80,000 Nigerian naira to purchase more fruits and drinks to sell. She says thank you.

loans.use: To purchase more drinks and fruits to sell

loans.name: Seynabou

texts.fr: seynabou N. habite camberene,elle est parent beneficiaire ,elle est couturiere depuis plus de dix ans.son objectif consiste aacheter des tissus en vue de les confectionner pour apres les exposer a la vente.cette femme veut augmenter ses revenus pour mieux assister  sa famille.
texts.en:
Seynabou N. lives in Camberene. She is a parent and a member of the credit union and has been a seamstress for more than 10 years. Her goal is to buy cloth to sew into garments to display and sell. This woman wishes to increase her income to better help her family.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: adding to her working capital

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel A. is a fisherman in Abotoase near Hohoe, who needs financial assistance. He has received schooling through junior high and is married and has six dependents. His wife is a trader whose income cannot support him in taking care of the family. He is solely responsible for all the financial needs of the children and the family as well.

His loan will be used to buy a fishing net to catch fish in large quantity to enable him take care of the needs of his large family. He hopes to save the new profits from his business.

loans.use: To buy a fishing net to catch fish in large quantity

loans.name: Jennet

texts.en: Jennet sells provisions, foodstuffs and drinks.  Jennet's shop is open from 7am to 11pm Mondays through Sundays. Jennet is 37 years old and married with 3 children. Jennet hopes for the loan amount of 100,000 Nigerian naira to purchase more provisions, drinks and foodstuffs to sell. She says thank you.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions, foodstuffs and drinks to sell

loans.name: Terrano Group

texts.en:
Fatuma I., age 41, is married with three children ages 22, 19, and 17. She has been selling food and water for 7 years. She works daily from 5am until 10pm. She is able to earn a monthly profit of around $138.

This will be Fatum’s 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She wants to use this loan to increase business capital and pay school fees.

Fatuma will share this loan with her loan group, Terrano which totals 22 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans. In the picture, Fatuma is 1st on the left standing second row.

loans.use: To expand store inventory and pay school fees
